ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: I would love an invis to undead song. Or a song that combined 2 songs effects (say song slot 1 is the first song, song slot 2 is the 2nd song, and song slot 3
ygData.messageBody:
I would love an invis to undead song. Or a song that combined 2 songs effects
(say song slot 1 is the first song, song slot 2 is the 2nd song, and song
slot 3 was the combiner).
Hmm, what else on my wish list....maybe an upgraded charm? say upto level 50
now that the expansion is comin out?
Of course bind would be cool but I just cant see that happening.

Renaldo singer of the 45th song
